about_the_game:
ASMR - Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response, is a pleasant tingling sensation around the head, neck and shoulders that occurs as a result of exposure to a specific stimulus - triggers. Typically, the triggers for this type of reaction are visual, tactile, or auditory sensations. In ASMR Food Experience, we will focus on combining two types of stimulus: sound and visual!

Run your own restaurant!

In the ASMR Food Experience, you play the role of the owner of a small restaurant. Some of your tasks in this simulator will be customer service. You will have to take care of proper deliveries, clean, take care of the herbarium and maintain the restaurant in the best condition. This will make a huge difference in the overall rating of your establishment, so you will increase interest, restaurant turnout and tips from guests.

Decorate and personalize

Your restaurant, your rule - would you like to have an Asian-style style? Or are you more interested in Mediterranean decor? Our simulator will allow you to run the business that best suits your taste. Decorate walls, change tables and arrange matching accessories inside and outside your restaurant! Over time, it will be more and more popular among customers, so you need to consider expanding your restaurant.

Omnipresent sounds

There will be tons of sounds in the ASMR Food Experience to help you experience the most desirable reactions - calmness, excitement, stress relief, and more. In the game, you will have full control over what sounds are in it: nature, cooking, cleaning, conversations or street sounds. Find something for yourself in this amazing simulator!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700k or AMD Ryzen 3 1200X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 / Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700k or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 8GB or AMD Radeon RX 5700 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
